name: Marjoram (Dried)
properties: Related to oregano with milder, sweeter flavor
Rich in vitamins A, C, and K
Contains carvacrol and other beneficial compounds
benefits: Dried marjoram is featured in borscht and other Eastern European-inspired dishes. Part of the mint family, related to oregano but with a more delicate, sweet flavor. Contains compounds that may support digestion and reduce inflammation. Alternative to basil, thyme, or other herbs in various recipes.
amount: 1 teaspoon dried, used in soups and stews
